meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>go</kanji> to <kanji>move</kanji> you're actually making an <vocabulary>action</vocabulary>. This word can also mean <vocabulary>behavior</vocabulary>, since your actions are what make up your behavior.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
